creditline: Gift of Sam and Patty McCullough in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: backrest has vase-like central element with heart cutout at center; two scalloped elements at top corners of backrest; three rounded lobes at top of backrest; straight back legs with square cross-sections; front legs are turned with pad-like feet; turned spindles--spindle at front has three large knobs at center, top spindles on sides have even beadlike patterning; woven plant fiber seat in trapezoidal shape
title: East Windsor side chair
